headline: Bank of America bonuses for investment bankers to rise about 10%, source says
summary: Bank of America's bonus pool for investment bankers will probably rise 10% for last year, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.  While the average increase will be 10%, some investment bankers will get smaller payouts in the mid-to-high single digits, while other top performers would exceed the 10% range, two other sources told Reuters.  BofA Securities ranked third on the global deals for investment banking fees in the fourth quarter, earning $1.4 billion in revenue, up sharply from $958 million in same period in 2023, according to Dealogic data.

headline: ETF Wisdom From Warren Buffett on Berkshire's 9th Straight Yearly Win
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway recorded the ninth straight-up year in 2024. Here's what to learn from it.

headline: Bank of America to Report Fourth Quarter 2024 Financial Results and Host Investor Conference Call on January 16
summary: As previously announced, Bank of America will report its fourth quarter 2024 financial results on Thursday, January 16. The results will be released at approximately 6:45 a.m. ET, followed by an investor conference call at 11:00 a.m. ET.

headline: Bank of America Bond Losses Could Top $100 Billion Due to Rising Rates
summary: Bank of America has the largest unrealized losses in the banking industry and could be a focus of investor attention.
